data.message: Principle-based Sonora redesign using 11 design principles audit: Successfully evaluated Sonora against all 11 principles, identified 4 issues (Emphasis, Balance, Pattern, Variety), applied targeted fixes (200px text, background letters for rhythm, balance elements on right). All principles now satisfied. User confirmed improvement.
data.task: Principle-based Sonora redesign using 11 design principles audit
